footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: North Shore Meditation is authorised to teach Transcendental Meditation® by the Maharashi Foundation of Australia. Clicking the "Start Your Journey" or "Book Your Free Session" buttons on this website will navigate you to the official booking system of Maharashi Foundation Australia where you will be able to book a free information session at the North Shore Transcendental Meditation® Center.

callToAction.subtitle: Join us for a free introductory session and discover the simplicity of Transcendental Meditation®.
callToAction.title: Ready to Experience Effortless Meditation?

steps.description: A certified TM teacher will guide you through the process in a series of sessions.
steps.title: Learn the technique

steps.description: Find a quiet place and sit in a comfortable position with your eyes closed.
steps.title: Sit comfortably

steps.description: Silently repeat a personalized mantra that is given to you by your TM teacher.
steps.title: Use your mantra

steps.description: Don't try to control or surpress your thoughts. Let them pass naturally.
steps.title: Let thoughts come and go

steps.description: There's no need to concentrate or try hard. The technique works effortlessly.
steps.title: Enjoy the process

steps.description: All it takes is 15-20 minutes twice a day
steps.title: Practice daily

cards.description: No need to control your mind or thoughts
cards.title: Effortless

cards.description: Works with your mind's natural tendencies
cards.title: Natural

cards.description: Backed by more than 250 independent universities and research institutions
cards.title: Effective

paragraphs: Transcendental Meditation® (TM) is a simple, natural technique practiced for 15-20 minutes twice a day while sitting comfortably with your eyes closed. It's easy to learn and enjoyable to practice. It is not a religion, philosophy, or lifestyle.

Unlike other forms of meditation, TM does not involve concentration, control of the mind, or monitoring your thoughts. It's an effortless technique that allows your mind to settle inward, beyond thought, to experience the silent reservoir of energy, creativity, and intelligence found within everyone.
This state of restful alertness reduces stress, refreshes the mind, and provides a broad range of benefits for your mind, body, and behaviour.
whatIsTm.title: What is Transcendental Meditation®?

tm.subtitle: Explore the simplicity and power of a practice that requires no concentration, no control of the mind, and no monitoring of thoughts.
tm.title: Simplicity in it's Effortlessness

callToAction.subtitle: Book your Transcendental Meditation® introductory session today.
callToAction.title: Ready to Transform Yourself?

hero.subtitle: Discover the power of Transcendental Meditation®
hero.title: The Kingdom of Heaven is Within

paragraphs: A customer once told Grace that "meditation is a very personal thing". We understand that. We are attentive to your needs in understanding and developing the habits for this simple and natural technique.
Grace has been certified to teach Transcendental Meditation® by the Maharashi Vedic University, and is authorized by the Maharashi Foundation of Australia to teach TM at North Shore Meditation.
learnFromGrace.title: Begin your journey with Grace

cards.description: Transcendental Meditation® helps you tap into a deep sense of calm and inner contentment. By quieting the mind and letting go of external distractions, you can experience a profound state of peace and lasting happiness from within.
cards.title: Discover Inner Peace and Joy

cards.description: Life's challenges become more manageable when you develop a strong foundation of resilience. Through regular practice of transcendental meditation, you cultivate the mental strength and emotional balance to stay grounded and composed, even in the face of adversity.
cards.title: Build Resilience from Within

cards.description: A calm and centered mind naturally improves the quality of your interactions with others. Transcendental Meditation® helps reduce reactive tendencies and promotes greater empathy, patience, and understanding, leading to deeper, more fulfilling relationships.
cards.title: Enhance Your Relationships

cards.description: In a fast-paced world, stress and anxiety are common challenges. Transcendental Meditation® offers a scientifically proven way to calm the nervous system, lower cortisol levels, and bring a sense of ease and relaxation into your daily life.
cards.title: Relieve Stress and Anxiety

cards.description: Creativity flourishes when the mind is free from distractions and mental blocks. Transcendental Meditation® encourages a state of relaxed alertness, allowing ideas to flow more freely and enabling you to tap into your natural creative potential.
cards.title: Expand Your Creative Potential

cards.description: A clear and focused mind is key to excelling in academics. By reducing mental clutter and enhancing cognitive functioning, Transcendental Meditation® sharpens your concentration, improves memory, and boosts your ability to learn and retain information.
cards.title: Achieve Academic Excellence

cards.description: Regular practice of Transcendental Meditation® supports better mental health by reducing symptoms of depression, anxiety, and burnout. It fosters emotional stability, self-awareness, and a balanced outlook on life, promoting long-term psychological well-being.
cards.title: Nurture Mental Health and Well-being

tagline: The Kingdom of Heaven is Within
